pr_title: [Fix] Fix results not showing in participation-submission component

timeline.message: Provided quickfix for results not showing
fixed issue where assessor was not shown

timeline.bodyText: please rename this method as well to reflect that the results + assessor are loaded as well
timeline.author: krusche
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -475,7 +475,7 @@ public StudentParticipation participationForQuizWithResult(QuizExercise quizExer
      * @return List<submission>
      */
     public List<Submission> getSubmissionsWithParticipationId(long participationId) {

replies.bodyText: this is important so that other potential users of this method immediately know what exactly is returned (also to realize if data such as the assessor can be exposed or not). This should also be reflected in the JavaDoc of the method
replies.author: krusche

timeline.message: Merge branch 'bugfix/results-participation-submission' of https://github.com/ls1intum/Artemis into bugfix/results-participation-submission
refactored results to use latestResult, renamed method
